content:
i updated my lean-toolchain to v4.20.1 and got this: info: downloading https://releases.lean-lang.org/lean4/v4.20.1/lean-4.20.0-linux.tar.zst on lake update.

isn't that weird? shouldn't it be /lean4/v4.20.1/lean-4.20.1-linux.tar.zst?

There was a mistake during the release process which led to the version number being wrong in this spot (and also some others) specifically for Lean 4.20.1. We noticed this, but decided that it's not a big enough problem to justify releasing a Lean 4.20.2.
Thanks for assuring me im not losin my noggin
